# Comparison With HiC Data

```{r}
merged_results %>% 
  subset(status != "Unchanged") %>% 
  mutate(hic_overlap = overlapsAny(., hic)) %>% 
  plotPie(fill = "hic_overlap", x = "feature", y = "region")
```

```{r}
merged_results %>% 
  mutate(hic_overlap = overlapsAny(., hic)) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  group_by(region, status) %>% 
  summarise(
    N = dplyr::n(),
    `% HiC` = mean(hic_overlap)
  )
```
